name: NPR
text:
The Grammys are renaming four categories traditionally associated with artists of color — including changing “Best Urban Contemporary Album” to “Best Progressive R&B Album.” 
https://t.co/gwjda1SjVa

name: NPR
text:
Amazon will ban the use of its facial recognition technology by law enforcement agencies for one year amid pressure from police-reform advocates and civil rights groups.
https://t.co/xhJMbUnXaH

name: NPR
text:
Prosecutors in Sweden say a now-deceased graphic designer, Stig Engström, was likely the assassin who gunned down Prime Minister Olof Palme more than three decades ago on a Stockholm street.
https://t.co/gB4bnBV5uK
